Name: apache-nifi
Overview: Apache NiFi supports powerful and scalable directed graphs of data routing, transformation, and system mediation logic.

configstoragepath.Name: Config Storage Path
configstoragepath.Description: This is where NIFI will store its databases and configuration.

webinterfaceport.Name: Web Interface Port
webinterfaceport.Description: This is NIFIs Web UI port you can access via a web browser.
